## Smart AI Calendar
# A calendar that  does everything for you

Take control with Caly's AI-powered open source calendar. Sync with Google Calendar and let AI handle your events and time.

[Join the beta](https://www.trycaly.cc/calendar)

![Caly Hero](https://www.trycaly.cc/_next/image?url=%2Fui-hero.png&w=3840&q=75)

## Features

Caly is an open source AI calendar that helps you manage your schedule intelligently.

AI Assistant

Analyzing your schedule...

Checking availability

Found optimal time

Scheduling meeting

✓ Meeting scheduled for 2:00 PM

### AI Calendar Agent

Your personal AI assistant that understands your schedule and helps you find the perfect time for everything.

Calendar Features

![Google Calendar](https://www.trycaly.cc/g-cal.svg)Google CalendarConnected

Full calendar functionality

✓ Events, reminders, tasks

### Google Calendar Integration

Complete calendar functionality with Google Calendar integration, event management, and team scheduling.

Smart Time Finding

Finding best time for:

Team Meeting

Available times:

9:00 AM✓ Best

2:00 PM✓ Best

4:00 PM✓ Best

AI found optimal time

### Smart Scheduling

AI-powered scheduling that finds the best time for meetings, tasks, and personal events, then helps you manage and optimize your daily routine.

Open Source

Repository

Public

Free to use

Open source

### Open Source

Built with transparency and community. Contribute, customize, and extend Caly to fit your needs.

## Frequently asked questions

Everything you need to know about Caly. Can't find what you're looking for?

### How does Caly's AI help me manage my calendar?

Caly's AI assistant understands natural language and can schedule meetings, set reminders, and organize your calendar through simple conversations. Just tell it what you need, and it handles the rest.
